sentences: Ta on töötanud arstina kümme aastat.
Me oleme töötanud koos palju projektidel.
context: The word 'töötanud' is the past participle form of the Estonian verb 'töötama', which means 'to work'. It indicates completed action or state in the past. In English, this would correspond to 'have/has worked' or simple past 'worked'. The word can be used in different tenses and contexts to indicate someone's professional experience or employment history.
